citations.narrative:
The facility did not ensure that primary enclosures were constructed and maintained so that they restrict other animals
from entering. Earlier this year, mink entered the peafowl enclosure and staff arrived to find the five peafowl deceased
and no living peafowl remaining. The facility has taken steps to trap and reduce mink around the enclosure and have
been altering the enclosure to make it more secure. The facility does not plan on obtaining more peafowl before
alterations to the enclosure are complete.
If other animals are permitted to enter the primary enclosure, these animals can cause injury and/or death to those
animals within the enclosure. Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they restrict other animals
from entering said enclosures. Corrective actions must be implemented by November 6, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(iv)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
The facility did not ensure that primary enclosures were constructed and maintained so that they restrict other animals 
from entering. Earlier this year, mink entered the peafowl enclosure and staff arrived to find the five peafowl deceased 
and no living peafowl remaining. The facility has taken steps to trap and reduce mink around the enclosure and have 
been altering the enclosure to make it more secure. The facility does not plan on obtaining more peafowl before 
alterations to the enclosure are complete.  
 
If other animals are permitted to enter the primary enclosure, these animals can cause injury and/or death to those 
animals within the enclosure. Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they restrict other animals 
from entering said enclosures. Corrective actions must be implemented by November 6, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
